availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel H. McCarty (Jeffersonville, Clark County, Indiana, farmer and fugitive from justice)

body.p: Clark County, Indiana, farmer and fugitive from justice. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Seamster McCarty. Father of Woodson McCarty. Laborer in Clark County, Indiana, in 1850. Farmer in Clark County in 1860. Charged with robbery in Clark County in 1865. Fugitive from justice in Kentucky in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Jeffersonville, p. 139B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Jeffersonville, p. 465.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Haysville Precinct, p. 36A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 1576.
